page.title: 14Social Concerns,Brickhill
page.content:
These concerns were expressed in the survey of 200 families:-
{Proposed nuclear waste dump......54 { Pollution from London Brick......23 { Fouling of area by animals.......15 { Stubble burning in September......7 { Bad road surfacing................7 { Need for Bedford by-pass..........8 { Litter in the area................7 { Graffiti/vandalism in area........8 { Use of chemicals in farming.......8 { Destruction of hedgerows,etc.....10 { Use of nuclear weapons............2 { Disparity between rich and poor...2 { Increasing inhumanity/injustice...1 { Assaults on young and the old.....1 { Moral standards/indiscipline......3 { Larger-family-group dying out.....1 { Hay fever caused by oil-seed rape.2 { {
